faqs.question: How long does it take to build a website?
faqs.answer: The timeline varies depending on the complexity of the project. A simple website might take 2-4 weeks, while more complex sites can take 2-3 months or more.

faqs.question: Do you provide website maintenance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer ongoing maintenance packages to keep your website secure, up-to-date, and performing optimally.

faqs.question: Can you redesign my existing website?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We can refresh your current site or completely rebuild it from the ground up, depending on your needs.

faqs.question: Will my website be mobile-friendly?
faqs.answer: Yes, all our websites are built with responsive design, ensuring they look and function great on all devices.
